DOC.brief_title: Single Incision Transvaginal Mesh Treatment Posterior Vaginal Wall Prolapse
DOC.detailed_description: The aim study investigate safety efficacy ElevateÂ®Posterior transvaginal mesh kit . Secondly investigator want evaluate effect surgical method non-affected anterior vaginal compartment well patient ' outcome . This prospective multicenter national study include patient ( n=111 ) symptomatic posterior vaginal wall without apical prolapse stage II . Patients recruit four university hospital five central hospital Finland September 2010 August 2013 . The study protocol approve Ethics Committees participate hospital attend patient give write consent oral write counseling . Baseline evaluation include standardized gynecological examination supine position use POP-Q system . Detailed information patient ' characteristic medical history gather , focus especially gynecological issue . Patients fill Pelvic Floor Distress Inventory ( PFDI-20 ) Pelvic organ prolapse/urinary Incontinence Sexual Questionnaire ( PISQ-12 ) . The operation perform qualified surgeon ( n=9 ) familiar transvaginal mesh surgery . Intraoperative data collect immediate postoperative problem register . The first follow-up visit take place three month postoperatively . Gynecological examination POP-Q measurement perform complication document . As preoperatively , PFDI-20 PISQ-12 questionnaire fill patient . The second visit take place one year postoperatively . Gynecological examination POP-Q measurement perform possible late complication document . PFDI-20 PISQ-12 questionnaire fill patient .
DOC.criteria: patient symptomatic posterior vaginal wall without apical prolapse stage II concomitant surgery , immunosuppressive treatment kind , previous forthcoming bowel operation low anastomosis creation previous vaginal radiation therapy
